spatial_accuracy.notes: Large-scale layout is generally preserved, but significant labeling errors occur (Bed-1 and Bed-2 are swapped in labels compared to the 2D plan). Some wall thicknesses and window placements deviate from the original blueprint.

structural_fidelity.notes: Failure to adhere to strict 'no text labels' constraint; measurement lines and labels are hallucinated and rendered into the 3D floor. A major hallucinated balcony with wooden stairs was added at the bottom which does not exist in the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is mostly accurate to the floor plan, using appropriate block-style models that match the intended layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The model uses textures (wood flooring) and photorealistic shadows/lighting, violating the low-poly/flat-shading constraint. The camera angle is true to isometric orthographic projection.

detected_errors.description: Critical violation of constraints: Text labels and dimension lines are rendered throughout the 3D model.
Hallucinated entry stairs/balcony structure at the bottom center not present in the 2D plan.
Violation of aesthetic constraints: Model uses realistic textures and dramatic soft-box lighting/shadows instead of flat shading.
Incorrect labeling: Bed-1 and Bed-2 labels are swapped relative to the coordinate positions in the source plan.
